title: Evaluación Final: Build SOC from Scratch

content.story_intro: 500 employees, SaaS product, $50M revenue. Build SOC capability.

steps.title: Company Profile
steps.content: Tech startup, 500 employees hybrid work. SaaS platform (AWS). Customer data: PII, payment info. Compliance: SOC 2, ISO 27001. Budget: $1M/year for SOC.
steps.insight: Startup constraints: Limited budget, fast growth, cloud-native, need to show compliance.

steps.title: Your Mission
steps.content: Design: 1) SOC team structure. 2) Technology stack (SIEM, EDR, etc). 3) Processes & playbooks. 4) Metrics & KPIs. 5) Budget allocation.
steps.insight: Balance: Security, cost, complexity, time-to-value. Can't have SOC in 1 week but need quick wins.

unlock_content.title: Staffing Model
points: Option A: In-house SOC. Hire: 1 SOC Manager, 4 Tier 1 Analysts (shift coverage), 2 Tier 2 IR. Cost: ~$700K/year salaries.
Option B: Hybrid. 1 internal SOC lead + MDR (Managed Detection & Response) vendor. Cost: ~$400K/year.
Option C: Full outsource to MSSP. Cost: ~$300K/year. Trade-off: Control vs cost.
Recommendation for startup: Hybrid (B). 1 internal lead, outsource 24/7 monitoring to MDR.
unlock_content.bonus_fact: SOC analyst average salary: $75K (Tier 1), $95K (Tier 2), $130K (Manager). Retention challenge.

unlock_content.title: Tool Selection
unlock_content.bonus_fact: Cloud-native tools (Sentinel) scale better for startups than on-prem SIEM (Splunk).

unlock_content.title: SOC Procedures
points: Incident classification: P1 (critical), P2 (high), P3 (medium), P4 (low)
Playbooks: Ransomware, phishing, data exfil, insider threat, DDoS
Escalation: When to escalate Tier 1 → Tier 2 → Management → CEO
On-call rotation: 24/7 coverage with MDR vendor + internal lead backup
Retainers: Incident response firm (Mandiant, CrowdStrike) for major incidents
unlock_content.bonus_fact: Having IR firm on retainer saves days during crisis. Pre-negotiated rates, faster response.

unlock_content.title: SOC Metrics
points: MTTD: Mean Time To Detect. Goal: <1 hour for critical
MTTR: Mean Time To Respond. Goal: <4 hours for critical
Alert volume: Track trend. Tuning reduces over time.
unlock_content.bonus_fact: Metrics drive improvement. Weekly review, monthly trend analysis, quarterly deep dive.

unlock_content.title: Budget Breakdown
unlock_content.bonus_fact: Rule of thumb: 40% people, 30% tech, 20% services, 10% buffer. Adjust based on needs.

unlock_content.title: Initial Setup
unlock_content.bonus_fact: Cloud tools = fast deployment. EDR + SIEM operational in weeks, not months.

unlock_content.title: Capability Building
unlock_content.bonus_fact: By Month 6: Detection coverage 70%, basic hunting, automated triage. Respectable SOC.

unlock_content.title: Maturity Growth
unlock_content.bonus_fact: Year 1 goal: Functional SOC, SOC 2 certified, demonstrable security improvement. Foundation for growth.
